= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * This will show information in the output about
   * Levels/Pups
   * Campaigns
   * Gquests
   * Quests

= Installation =
 * see the [Installation] page
 * The default command for this plugin is "statmn"

= Help =
 {{{
/*
StatMonitor v1 Commands
-----------------------------------------------
debug          : toggle debugging
help           : show help
objects        : list objects associated with this plugin
report         : show stats for the last x minutes, x being what is passed as an argument
reset          : reset settings to default values
save           : save plugin variables
set            : set settings
*/
 }}}

 * settings
  {{{
StatMonitor v1 Settings
-----------------------------------------------
tdebug               : false                - show debugging info for this option
plugin_colour        : orange               - set the plugin colour
reportminutes        : 120                  - the number of minutes that Statmon reports on
showminutes          : 30                   - the number of minutes between StatMon output
cmd                  : statmon              - the command to type for this plugin
  }}}
